sentences.en: A police motorcycle chased his car twelve miles, and cornered him near Rome.
sentences.cn: 一辆摩托警车跟在他的车后追了12英里，最后在快到罗马时将他截住。

sentences.en: Even his death, after crashing his motorcycle on a bridge in New Orleans, was spectacular.
sentences.cn: 甚至他骑摩托车在新奥尔良撞桥身亡的事也轰动一时。
吉尔伯特乘摩托车去的那儿.

sentences.en: He runs behind a motorcycle for half an hour every morning.
sentences.cn: 他每天早晨跟在摩托车后面跑半个小时。

sentences.en: He swung his leg over the motorcycle, straddling it easily.
sentences.cn: 他一骗腿轻而易举地骑上摩托车。

sentences.en: I received the sad news that he had been killed in a motorcycle accident.
sentences.cn: 我得知了这个不幸的消息，说他在一场摩托车事故中丧生。

sentences.en: I won't have him risking his neck on that motorcycle.
sentences.cn: 我不会让他冒险骑那辆摩托车。

sentences.en: She can ride a motorcycle, to say nothing of a bicycle.
sentences.cn: 她摩托车都会骑, 自行车更不在话下了.

sentences.en: She can ride a motorcycle， to say nothing of a bicycle.
sentences.cn: 她摩托车都会骑， 自行车更不在话下了。

sentences.en: The gunman escaped on a motorcycle being ridden by an accomplice.
sentences.cn: 持枪歹徒坐上一辆由同伙驾驶的摩托车逃逸。

sentences.en: The motorcycle gunned through the streets.
sentences.cn: 摩托车加大油门穿过街道.

sentences.en: The motorcycle raced along the street at lightning speed.
sentences.cn: 摩托车飞快地从街上驶过.

sentences.en: These rough roads soon wore the tread of motorcycle tires off.
sentences.cn: 这些崎岖不平的路很快就把摩托车轮胎磨平了.

sentences.en: They made their getaway along a pavement on a stolen motorcycle.
sentences.cn: 他们骑上偷来的摩托车沿着人行道逃走了。

sentences.en: They saw a squadron of fifteen motorcycle policemen driving in V-formation.
sentences.cn: 他们看见15名警察骑着摩托车排成V字形前行。

sentences.en: They sell used and reconditioned motorcycle parts.
sentences.cn: 他们出售二手的和翻新的摩托车零件。

sentences.en: You'd better encash your motorcycle at once.
sentences.cn: 你最好马上卖掉摩托车换成现款。

words.tran_cn: 骑摩托车的人；乘机车者

phrases.tran_cn: 摩托车发动机；摩托车引擎

trans.tran_en: a fast two-wheeled vehicle with an engine
